display_name: Horne-Ostberg Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire: Morning or evening type
description:
Item from the Horne-Ostberg Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire. [Horne JA and Ostberg O, 1976 (PubMed ID: 1027738)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1027738)

Original question: *20. One hears about "morning" and "evening" types of people. Which ONE of these types do you consider yourself to be?*

[Search for all HOMEQ variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/mesa/variables?search=homeq)
